title: My champion idea
body:
I have an idea for a champion my dream for 2 years is to work for Riot games as a champion designer and this is one of the ideas I have for a champion- 

Passive-
Every AA places a stack on the target dealing bonus attack damage and granting HP% back to X 

Q-
X rolls to the side and gains a bonus attack range for a limited time

W-
Passive- On the third strike of your passive gain 0% movement speed for 1.5 seconds

Gain a 0% shield for 3 seconds 

E- Shoot a bolt of energy slowing, if this is cast on your third stack of your passive it will stun for 2 seconds 

R- Fire an beam of energy with every auto attack dealing bonus damage, attack speed, and range.


The champion will use a ranged weapon.

If you have any more ideas to add please post them here :)

replies.body: Ok.. That 0% shield and 0% speedboost seems too op. Tone it down a bit.. Just kidding. This sounds like a mix between Vayne, Quinn, Ekko, Vi, Velkoz and Bard all mixed into each one with nothing really changed.. Also look up how they come up with designs etc. Every aspect of the game is to move foward and away from ANTI-FUN which would be auras for example.. No one really appreciates the auras even if they are op. Just because it's boring..
Hmm OK I kinda went with a new interesting things didn't realise i was mixing them together
